long_description: Don't be fooled by the small size of the collapsible UCO Clarus LED lantern/flashlight. It provides up to 150 lumens of diffused white light and projects a beam up to 50m (164 ft.). The Clarus can be used as both a lantern and flashlight; simply slide the frosted globe up for lantern mode and down for flashlight mode. Bright XP-E R3 Cree LED shines a diffused white light on your campsite so you can enjoy the night long after the sun goes down. Use the on/off button to switch between low, mid and high brightness levels; use the strobe mode for signaling. 3 AAA alkaline batteries (sold separately) provide up to 70 hrs. of use. Includes a hook for hanging the lantern at your campsite. Lantern collapses down to 4.5 in. tall for simple storage and transportation. Durable plastic base stands up to regular use in the outdoors. UCO Clarus LED lantern has an IPX6 water resistance rating to ensure operation in inclement weather.
short_description: Don't be fooled by the small size of the collapsible UCO Clarus LED lantern/flashlight. It provides up to 150 lumens of diffused white light and projects a beam up to 50m (164 ft.).
